price: Раҳмондан ғойибона қўрқиб, тавба қилгувчи қалб билан келганлар учун.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
